title: How is Zoe any healthier than AP Kog'Maw?
body: At least Kog'Maw doesn't have an AoE _single target_ 2s ~~stun~~ sleep effect

replies.body: Well at least Zoe doesn't have an AoE 2s stun either.

>The bubble deals magic damage on contact with an enemy and renders them Drowsy icon drowsy for 2.2 seconds, which gradually Slow icon slows them, after which they fall Sleep icon asleep for 2 seconds

Affects a single target. There's an "area of effect" in which you can suffer from the stun, yes, but it doesn't affect more than one person.

AoE stun is like Jax E.

Does it slow additional people? I've only solo laned vs Zoe as TF. Any time I walk up to stun her she face throws her E and I get sleepy for 2 whole seconds. TF gold card lasts 1 second (increasing to 2 at max rank) so I literally can't trade with her if I get hit by the face E. "So just dodge it?" The ability has 800range whereas my TF aa range is 525. Good Zoe's either play aggressive with E knowing they can hit it or they hold onto it knowing they'll win the trade when engaged on.

I'm assuming you mean season 5 ap kog. First, as someone mentioned, Zoe also lacks an aoe stun. Second, kog ult had a lower cooldown, didn't require putting him close to danger, and could ignore minions/body blocking. His disadvantages were lacking self peel and requiring multiple hits to kill.

AoE drowse ability that hits the first target, whatever. I'm comparing how Zoe can sling her spells over and over again either clearing waves or one-shotting anything. 

> kog ult had a lower cooldown, didn't require putting him close to danger
Lower cooldown, yes. But abominable mana costs associated with it. You literally have to wait until Seraphs to spam R but even then you aren't at the luxury or smashing your R key. The biggest complaint about AP Kog is reliable damage at a safe distance. But reliable =/= being able to one shot squishies. To be successful on AP Kog, you have to be able to land Q, E, R, R, R or at least E, R , R. If you don't at least land E then you're done. All of AP Kog's main abilities cost so much mana (E starting out at 80 mana and R stacking mana). Zoe just waits for her CD on E and Q or just Q itself. With the abundance of CDR she really doesn't have to wait that long.

Maybe because Zoe requires linesight for all of her spells? That she has a plethora of items and champions that can counter her?

Whereas Kog'Maw is a 710 range high speed point and click auto-attack that does %health magic damage shred, which is hard to itemize against since it's hybrid %hp damage?
AP Kog'Maw does most of his damage with E and R. I have no idea what AP Kog you're talking about.
AP Kog has no sustained damage and not even very good burst? His strength is poke/execute.

People complain about AP Kog any time he becomes viable. "He's too safe" Okay, yeah he sits under tower but at least he doesn't stun you for 2 years and hit you with a true damage comet that hits like a truck.
Well atleast both are too much and hated by the community with a passion.
Zoe's being approached with careful nerfs whereas Kog'Maw E lost 20% AP scaling and R was just butchered.
